Enum Class Side

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<Side>
org.moddingx.launcherlib.util.Side
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<Side>, Constable
public enum Side extends Enum<Side>
Marks a physical side for a mod to be placed in.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class Enum

    Enum.EnumDesc<E>

  • Enum Constant Summary

    Enum Constants
    Enum Constant
    Description
    CLIENT
    Only the physical client without server.
    COMMON
    Both client and server.
    SERVER
    Only the dedicated server without the client.

    • get

      @Nullable public static Side get(boolean client, boolean server)
      Gets a side object that matches the given availability on client and server. If both client and server are false, null is returned.

    • merge

      public static Side merge(Side... sides)
      Merges multiple Sides to return a Side that includes all of them. Merging zero sides returns COMMON. Otherwise if sides contains only CLIENT values, CLIENT is returned, if sides contains only SERVER values, SERVER is returned. If sides contains both CLIENT and SERVER or contains COMMON, COMMON is returned.

    • and

      @Nullable public static Side and(Side... sides)
      Adds multiple Sides. This can be used to determine the required side for transitive dependencies. Suppose a mod A is installed on side sideA and has a dependency for side sideB. and(sideA, sideB) would then be the side, on which the dependency is required.

      If the dependency is not required at all (for example because mod A is only installed on the server but mod B is a client only dependency of mod A), this method returns null.
